QuestData.Title: Set it Off!
QuestData.Description: Things are looking good. Let's do this.$B$BThe stack of bombs is right near the pit. I'll start to evacuate the men.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Kendall, below Icecrown Citadel, wants you to go to the nearby Saronite Bomb Stack to light the fuse.
QuestData.RewardText: These bombs look pretty potent. They should at least put a dent in the surrounding structure.
